授業目的: This course will guide students to pursue their own programs of study.  Students will be expected to write reports which they will present in class in order to reach an improved understanding of the themes they have selected for their graduation theses.
到達目標: Students will critically think and question general beliefs about language and determine whether they are scientifically valid.
授業方法:
group discussion
individual presentation
English-medium instruction
---------------------------------------
When necessary, remote class meetings will be given through a video conferencing application, such as Zoom.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to be fully prepared for each class, based on their written drafts, so that they can improve their ideas and presentation skills through in-class discussions and their own presentations.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Levels of presentations, discussions and one final paper.
